message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think it would be a great deal for you!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $135?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. How about $132.50?
